name: partial-next-big-nashville-lineup-released-prices-go-up-nbn-09
title: Partial Next Big Nashville Lineup Released, Prices Go Up [NBN '09]
author: Morgan Levy
contentEncoded:
Next Big Nashville has released a partial lineup for this year’s festival, taking place October 7-11. Yet awesomeness comes with a price – Ticket prices are on the rise, but don’t say we didn’t warn you. Wristbands are now $40 and include access to all Next Big Nashville showcases over the four days, and $100 VIP badges will get you access to all that, plus panel discussions, VIP parties (and some with food) and more. Here’s the partial lineup you’ll get to see with those tickets:

Black Angels
Jemina Pearl
